# samsungcloudplatform_config_inspection (Data Source)

Get diagnosis result details


## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_config_inspection" "my_config_inspection_detail" {
  diagnosis_id = "DIA-XXXXXXXXXX"
}

output "output_config_inspection_detail" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_config_inspection.my_config_inspection_detail
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `diagnosis_id` (String) Diagnosis ID

### Read-Only

- `auth_key_response` (Block Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--auth_key_response))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `schedule_response` (Block Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--schedule_response))
- `summary_response` (Block Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--summary_response))

<a id="nestedblock--auth_key_response"></a>
### Nested Schema for `auth_key_response`

Read-Only:

- `auth_key_create_dt` (String) Auth Key Start Date
- `auth_key_expire_dt` (String) Auth Key Expiration Date
- `auth_key_id` (String) start date
- `auth_key_state` (String) Auth Key State
- `user_id` (String) User id


<a id="nestedblock--schedule_response"></a>
### Nested Schema for `schedule_response`

Read-Only:

- `diagnosis_id` (String) Diagnosis ID
- `diagnosis_start_time_pattern` (String) Diagnosis Start Time (5-minute interval, 00~23 hours, 00~55 minutes)
- `frequency_type` (String) Diagnosis Schedule Type (Monthly, Weekly, Daily)
- `frequency_value` (String) Diagnosis Schedule (0131, MondaySunday, everyDay)
- `use_diagnosis_check_type_bp` (String) Use Best Practice Checklist
- `use_diagnosis_check_type_ssi` (String) Use SSI Checklist


<a id="nestedblock--summary_response"></a>
### Nested Schema for `summary_response`

Read-Only:

- `created_dt` (String) Start Date
- `csp_type` (String) CSP Type (SCP, AWS, Azure)
- `diagnosis_account` (String) Diagnosis account
- `diagnosis_check_type` (String) BP or SSI
- `diagnosis_id` (String) Diagnosis ID
- `diagnosis_name` (String) Diagnosis Name
- `diagnosis_type` (String) Diagnosis Type(Console, SSI)
- `error_state` (String) Error State
- `plan_type` (String) Plan Type (STANDARD, MONTHLY)
- `recent_diagnosis_dt` (String) Recent Diagnosis Date
- `recent_diagnosis_state` (String) Recent Diagnosis State
